title: Wonder of Doctor Strange
text: Sherlock star Benedict Cumberbatch joins the MCU as Dr. Stephen Strange in this origin story that covers Strange’s transformation from crippled surgeon to Sorcerer Supreme.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
text: Guardians of the Galaxy 2 continues the adventures of the Guardians crew as they fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mysteries of Peter Quill’s (Chris Pratt) true parentage.

title: Strange Wonder Woman.
text: Wonder Woman breaks new ground next June as the first female-fronted, female-directed superhero movie.
